title: Ion transport mechanisms in covalent organic frameworks: implications for technology
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00409D, Review Article
Wonmi Lee, Haochen Li, Zhilin Du, Dawei Feng
This review explores designing highly ion-conductive COFs for advanced electrochemical devices, merging theory and practice.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
